attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has the worst smile in the country, if not the planet. It does not even look real. Would somone please help him smile better or completely ban him from smiling before the 9pm watershed. It scares the kids and the cat has run behind the sofa and will not come back out. Come on! Please stop kidding us that this is a real smile. We know it is fake as Gordon Brown has currently nothing to smile about!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
